main.name: Lorenzo Syku
main.description: I love React and Blockchain technology, and I'm very interested in WEB3.0
main.bio: Hi there! I am Lorenzo! I've been coding for over 7 months now. I started coding after a friend told me about it. Along the journey I realised my passion for problem-solving. With this passion, I coded my first app, which is a tip calculator that we could use at work so every busboy, food-runner and waiter would know immidiately how much they made that night. 4 months ago I joined the Papafam community, led by Sonny and Jay, and after working with their materials I feel confident enough to lunch my own website, where  I will display all the coming projects! Stay tuned WEB 3.0 is coming!

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: I like improving my skills by working on clones of popular apps and then implementing what I learned into my own projects. I have experience working with fetching and manipulating data from endpoints and rendering it on the screen with a pleasing UI, with the power of REACTJS, NEXTJS and Tailwindcss.

testimonials.text: Lorenzo is very professional when it comes to work and very easy to work with. He always tries to give his best!
I know him for 5 years now. He is reliable, driven and trustworthy. I can honestly say that he would be my first pick if I ever needed someone to make me a website/app
Hardworking man! He will always go the extra mile and is a great team player!
